overview: The relationship between the young Goh (Nikki Sura Teerakul)  with Ying (Ying Apisara Rakchat) with the personality of Goh, who is flirting different from other people  To be in a relationship with Ying Goh, she had to have a duty to take her home regularly.  On that day, Goh met Ying's sister by accident. Because all the time Goh did not expect that a woman would have siblings.  Which is up to 3 women, so Goh did everything possible to get into the woman's house. without knowing that the four brothers  Behavior that is different from the general population Will Goh be able to escape from Ying's house or not? What will be the end?
title: 4 On 1
